page.title: 05SKEW BRIDGE SKI CLUB
page.content:
SKEW BRIDGE SKI CLUB.
Skew Bridge provides various facilities.It is situated north of the Northampton Road and can be approached by a track going under the old railway line.It mainly deals with dry slope skiing,water skiing and squash.There is a club as well.To ski on the dry slope you hire all the equipment you need and go to the slopes.There are two slopes,each using a rope lift.There are skiing instructors to help the beginner and the experienced skier can go down the new slope.There are chalets for the holiday-maker and a big lake for all water-skiers with a ramp in it.It costs Â£92 for a year's membership but you still have to pay extra for some activities.
Anthony Shortland.
